com.hazelcast.cache.impl.event

Interface CacheWanEventPublisher


  • public interface CacheWanEventPublisher
    This interface provides methods to publish wan replication events from cache operations.

    Methods of this class should be called from within the partition thread to keep event order for keys belonging to a single partition.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void publishWanReplicationRemove(String cacheNameWithPrefix, Data key)
      This method will create a wrapper object using the given CacheEntryView and place it to wan replication queues.
      void publishWanReplicationRemoveBackup(String cacheNameWithPrefix, Data key)
      Backup operations of operations that call this#publishWanReplicationRemove(String, Data) should call this method to provide wan event backups
      void publishWanReplicationUpdate(String cacheNameWithPrefix, CacheEntryView<Data,Data> entryView)
      This method will create a wrapper object using the given CacheEntryView and place it to wan replication queues.
      void publishWanReplicationUpdateBackup(String cacheNameWithPrefix, CacheEntryView<Data,Data> entryView)
      Backup operations of operations that call this#publishWanReplicationUpdate(String, CacheEntryView) should call this method to provide wan event backups

    • Method Detail

      • publishWanReplicationUpdate

        void publishWanReplicationUpdate(String cacheNameWithPrefix,
                                 CacheEntryView<Data,Data> entryView)
        This method will create a wrapper object using the given CacheEntryView and place it to wan replication queues.

        Updating cache operations should call this method in their Operation.afterRun() method.

        Parameters:
        cacheNameWithPrefix - the full name of the ICache, including the manager scope prefix
        entryView - the updated cache entry
        See Also:
        CachePutOperation, CacheGetAndReplaceOperation

      • publishWanReplicationRemove

        void publishWanReplicationRemove(String cacheNameWithPrefix,
                                 Data key)
        This method will create a wrapper object using the given CacheEntryView and place it to wan replication queues.

        Cache operations which removes data from cache should call this method in their Operation.afterRun() method.

        Parameters:
        cacheNameWithPrefix - the full name of the ICache, including the manager scope prefix
        key - the key of the removed entry
        See Also:
        CacheRemoveOperation

      • publishWanReplicationUpdateBackup

        void publishWanReplicationUpdateBackup(String cacheNameWithPrefix,
                                       CacheEntryView<Data,Data> entryView)
        Backup operations of operations that call this#publishWanReplicationUpdate(String, CacheEntryView) should call this method to provide wan event backups
        Parameters:
        cacheNameWithPrefix - the full name of the ICache, including the manager scope prefix
        entryView - the updated cache entry
        See Also:
        CachePutBackupOperation

      • publishWanReplicationRemoveBackup

        void publishWanReplicationRemoveBackup(String cacheNameWithPrefix,
                                       Data key)
        Backup operations of operations that call this#publishWanReplicationRemove(String, Data) should call this method to provide wan event backups
        Parameters:
        cacheNameWithPrefix - the full name of the ICache, including the manager scope prefix
        key - the key of the removed entry
        See Also:
        CacheRemoveBackupOperation
